title: Android 13 adds a new “low power standby” mode for Android TV devices
content:
While Android 13 is a pretty important OS update we’re all talking about, another OS update based on Android 13 will be for Android TV. The post Android 13 adds a new “low power standby” mode for Android TV devices appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Android 13 has added a new "low power standby" mode for Android TV devices, which prevents apps from running in the background.
